channel.title: Obsidian Vault
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Forest
item.description:
The forest is the staring dimension of the game and the main home base of the local scrapersSubareasMain Base main base of operations for local scrappers made out of a converted gas station upgrades and missions are gained here its a more rural scraper outpost that has semi-recently been established to deal with the rise of dimensional leaks Forests thick forests surrounding the main base dirt roads are carved through the terrain by scrapper trucks, the ground is covered by a thick moss and covered by winding vines and fallen trees
Abandoned Bunkers
overgrown concrete bunkers in the deep forest, dark and dangerous but contain valuable scrap use dynamite to clear collapsed passages and reveal the most unstable scrap

item.title: Scrapers
item.description: group of people tasked with collecting unstable scrap to prevent dimensional Decay mostly decentralized organization, not "secretly they are the bad guys" they just kinda exist

item.title: Dimensional Decay
item.description: Dimensional Decay is the process of a dimensions temporal stability degrading as a result of objects "leaking" between dimensions this requires the use of Scrapers to eliminate the undesirable effects this puts a soft timer on scraping missions with the player slowly beginning to take damage from the instability similar to pacific drives mechanics

item.title: Upgrade System
item.description: Upgadesreduced bounciness for items in truck increased speed scrap scanner

item.title: Index
item.description:
Name: Codename: ScrapperDesc: this game is a smaller 3d scrap colleting game similar to lethal company but the main mode of transport is a largescrap hauler vehicle. the main gameplay loop consists of finding scraped that has leaked over from other dimensions and returning them to their dimension of origin for a reward.Major Mechanics Driving
Dimensional portals
Dimensional Decay Unique Scrap Mechanics
Upgrade System Graphics the main style of the game is a simple Vector style with sharp clean textures and hard shadowsDimensions
Forest
Negative
Spikes
Morel
Void Wind
Mirror
Burning Plains

item.title: Burning Plains
item.description: area based on Zdzislaw Beksinski art Burning City ruins of a city eternally burning Plains wide open plains with occasional ruins and leafless trees

item.title: Mirror
item.description: this dimension is a land of mirror water and two mirrored worlds driving or jumping into a mirror lake leads to the mirror region of the world with you on the ceiling when you where on the floor Mirror fish slowly swim through the sky maze somewhere white and blue color scheme

item.title: Void Wind
item.description: A web of thin paths over an endless void. Storms rage in the sky and lightning strikes often creating lightning glass a valuable resource. Scrap can be found floating and can be captured to a netgun grey and dark blue with purple lightning

item.title: Morel
item.description: large landmass of tunnels resembling a morel mushroom gravity is relative to the nearest face and does not have a global "down" the caves walls are thin yet strong and you can find occasional deposits of a resinous substance

item.title: Spikes
item.description: barren flat plains with large spiky shining metal spikes the metal hums and shivers and you can hear twisting and creaking in the distance dry cracked grey ground with the occasional rock

item.title: Dimensional portals
item.description: Dimension Portals are the main mode of transport between dimensions each portal starts deactivated and must be manually reactivated

item.title: scrap hauler vehicle
item.description: The Scrap Hauler Vehicle or SHV is the main mode of transporting scrap collected in the game. The vehicle has a large flatbed back and a half track drivetrain with a integrated crane built into the front half of the vehicleexample photo of drivetrain (back track may be mildly elongated in final version)
